verses.verse: Or <S%G2228><s%> do you not know, <S%G50><s%> brethren <S%G80><s%> (for I am speaking <S%G2980><s%> to those who know <S%G1097><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%>), that the law <S%G3551><s%> has <S%G2961><s%> jurisdiction <S%G2961><s%> over <S%G2961><s%> a person <S%G444><s%> as long <S%G5550><s%> as he lives <S%G2198><s%>?

For the married <S%G5220><s%> woman <S%G1135><s%> is bound <S%G1210><s%> by law <S%G3551><s%> to her husband <S%G435><s%> while he is living; <S%G2198><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> her husband <S%G435><s%> dies, <S%G599><s%> she is released <S%G2673><s%> from the law <S%G3551><s%> concerning the husband. <S%G435><s%>

So <S%G686><s%> then <S%G686><s%> if, <S%G1437><s%> while her husband <S%G435><s%> is living, <S%G2198><s%> she is joined <S%G1096><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%> man, <S%G435><s%> she shall be called <S%G5537><s%> an adulteress; <S%G3428><s%> but if <S%G1437><s%> her husband <S%G435><s%> dies, <S%G599><s%> she is free <S%G1658><s%> from the law, <S%G3551><s%> so that she is not an adulteress, <S%G3428><s%> though she is joined <S%G1096><s%> to another <S%G2087><s%> man. <S%G435><s%>

Therefore, <S%G5620><s%> my brethren, <S%G80><s%> you also <S%G2532><s%> were made <S%G2289><s%> to die <S%G2289><s%> to the Law <S%G3551><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the body <S%G4983><s%> of Christ, <S%G5547><s%> that you might be joined <S%G1096><s%> to another, <S%G2087><s%> to Him who was raised <S%G1453><s%> from the dead, <S%G3498><s%> that we might bear <S%G2592><s%> fruit <S%G2592><s%> for God. <S%G2316><s%>

For while <S%G3753><s%> we were in the flesh, <S%G4561><s%> the sinful <S%G266><s%> passions, <S%G3804><s%> which were [aroused] by the Law, <S%G3551><s%> were at work <S%G1754><s%> in the members <S%G3196><s%> of our body to bear <S%G2592><s%> fruit <S%G2592><s%> for death. <S%G2288><s%>

But now <S%G3570><s%> we have been released <S%G2673><s%> from the Law, <S%G3551><s%> having died <S%G599><s%> to that by which <S%G3739><s%> we were bound, <S%G2722><s%> so <S%G5620><s%> that we serve <S%G1398><s%> in newness <S%G2538><s%> of the Spirit <S%G4151><s%> and not in oldness <S%G3821><s%> of the letter. <S%G1121><s%>

What <S%G5101><s%> shall we say <S%G3004><s%> then <S%G3767><s%>? Is the Law <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G266><s%>? May it never <S%G3361><s%> be! On the contrary, <S%G235><s%> I would not have come to know <S%G1097><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> except <S%G1508><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the Law; <S%G3551><s%> for I would not have known <S%G3609><s%> about <S%G3609><s%> coveting <S%G1939><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> the Law <S%G3551><s%> had not said, <S%G3004><s%> "You shall not covet. <S%G1937><s%>"

But sin, <S%G266><s%> taking <S%G2983><s%> opportunity <S%G874><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the commandment, <S%G1785><s%> produced <S%G2716><s%> in me coveting <S%G1939><s%> of every <S%G3956><s%> kind; <S%G3956><s%> for apart <S%G5565><s%> from the Law <S%G3551><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> [is] dead. <S%G3498><s%>

And I was once <S%G4218><s%> alive <S%G2198><s%> apart <S%G5565><s%> from the Law; <S%G3551><s%> but when the commandment <S%G1785><s%> came, <S%G2064><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> became <S%G326><s%> alive, <S%G326><s%> and I died; <S%G599><s%>
and this <S%G3778><s%> commandment, <S%G1785><s%> which was to result <S%G1519><s%> in life, <S%G2222><s%> proved <S%G2147><s%> to result <S%G1519><s%> in death <S%G2288><s%> for me;

for sin, <S%G266><s%> taking <S%G2983><s%> opportunity <S%G874><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> the commandment, <S%G1785><s%> deceived <S%G1818><s%> me, and through <S%G1223><s%> it killed <S%G615><s%> me.
So <S%G5620><s%> then, <S%G5620><s%> the Law <S%G3551><s%> is holy, <S%G40><s%> and the commandment <S%G1785><s%> is holy <S%G40><s%> and righteous <S%G1342><s%> and good. <S%G18><s%>

Therefore <S%G3767><s%> did that which <S%G18><s%> is good <S%G18><s%> become <S%G1096><s%> [a cause of] death <S%G2288><s%> for me? May it never <S%G3361><s%> be! Rather <S%G235><s%> it was sin, <S%G266><s%> in order <S%G2443><s%> that it might be shown <S%G5316><s%> to be sin <S%G266><s%> by effecting <S%G2716><s%> my death <S%G2288><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> that which <S%G18><s%> is good, <S%G18><s%> that through <S%G1223><s%> the commandment <S%G1785><s%> sin <S%G266><s%> might become <S%G1096><s%> utterly <S%G5236><s%> sinful. <S%G266><s%>
For we know <S%G3609><s%> that the Law <S%G3551><s%> is spiritual; <S%G4152><s%> but I am <S%G1510><s%> of flesh, <S%G4560><s%> sold <S%G4097><s%> into bondage to sin. <S%G266><s%>

For that which <S%G3739><s%> I am doing, <S%G2716><s%> I do not understand; <S%G1097><s%> for I am not practicing <S%G4238><s%> what <S%G3739><s%> I [would] like <S%G2309><s%> to [do,] but I am doing <S%G4160><s%> the very <S%G3778><s%> thing <S%G3739><s%> I hate. <S%G3404><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> I do <S%G4160><s%> the very <S%G3778><s%> thing <S%G3778><s%> I do not wish <S%G2309><s%> [to do], I agree <S%G4852><s%> with the Law, <S%G3551><s%> [confessing] that it is good. <S%G2570><s%>
So <S%G1161><s%> now, <S%G3570><s%> no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> am I the one doing <S%G2716><s%> it, but sin <S%G266><s%> which indwells <S%G1774><s%> me.

For I know <S%G3609><s%> that nothing <S%G3756><s%> good <S%G18><s%> dwells <S%G3611><s%> in me, that is, in my flesh; <S%G4561><s%> for the wishing <S%G2309><s%> is present <S%G3873><s%> in me, but the doing <S%G2716><s%> of the good <S%G2570><s%> [is] not.
For the good <S%G18><s%> that I wish, <S%G2309><s%> I do not do; <S%G4160><s%> but I practice <S%G4238><s%> the very <S%G3778><s%> evil <S%G2556><s%> that I do not wish. <S%G2309><s%>

But if <S%G1487><s%> I am doing <S%G4160><s%> the very <S%G3778><s%> thing <S%G3778><s%> I do not wish, <S%G2309><s%> I am no <S%G3765><s%> longer <S%G3765><s%> the one doing <S%G2716><s%> it, but sin <S%G266><s%> which dwells <S%G3611><s%> in me.
I find <S%G2147><s%> then <S%G686><s%> the principle <S%G3551><s%> that evil <S%G2556><s%> is present <S%G3873><s%> in me, the one who wishes <S%G2309><s%> to do <S%G4160><s%> good. <S%G2570><s%>
For I joyfully <S%G4913><s%> concur <S%G4913><s%> with the law <S%G3551><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> in the inner <S%G2080><s%> man, <S%G444><s%>

but I see <S%G991><s%> a different <S%G2087><s%> law <S%G3551><s%> in the members <S%G3196><s%> of my body, waging <S%G497><s%> war <S%G497><s%> against <S%G497><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of my mind, <S%G3563><s%> and making <S%G163><s%> me a prisoner <S%G163><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> of sin <S%G266><s%> which is in my members. <S%G3196><s%>
Wretched <S%G5005><s%> man <S%G444><s%> that I am! Who <S%G5101><s%> will set <S%G4506><s%> me free <S%G4506><s%> from the body <S%G4983><s%> of this <S%G3778><s%> death <S%G2288><s%>?

Thanks <S%G5485><s%> be to God <S%G2316><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> our Lord! <S%G2962><s%> So <S%G686><s%> then, <S%G686><s%> on the one <S%G3303><s%> hand <S%G3303><s%> I myself <S%G846><s%> with my mind <S%G3563><s%> am serving <S%G1398><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of God, <S%G2316><s%> but on the other, <S%G1161><s%> with my flesh <S%G4561><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> of sin. <S%G266><s%>
